hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
sudo yum -y install autoconf automake bison flex bzip2-devel curl-devel freetype-devel gcc gcc-c++ sudo yum -y install gdbm-devel git gmp-devel libdb-devel libjpeg-devel openldap-devel libpng-devel libtool sudo yum -y install libxml2-devel libXpm-devel libxslt-devel make mysql-devel net-snmp-devel openssl-devel pcre-devel sudo yum -y install pkgconfig postgresql-devel readline-devel unixODBC-devel vim wget
cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/php/php-src.git
cd php-src git checkout tags/php-7.1.2
sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/libldap.so /usr/lib/libldap.so sudo ln -sf /usr/lib64/liblber.so /usr/lib/liblber.so sudo ln -sf /usr/include/gmp-s390x.h /usr/include/gmp.h
sudo yum -y install libicu-devel
cd $WORK_DIR wget ftp://rpmfind.net/linux/fedora-secondary/releases/25/Everything/s390x/os/Packages/l/libmcrypt-2.5.8-18.fc24.s390x.rpm wget ftp://rpmfind.net/linux/fedora-secondary/releases/25/Everything/s390x/os/Packages/l/libmcrypt-devel-2.5.8-18.fc24.s390x.rpm sudo rpm -ivh libmcrypt-2.5.8-18.fc24.s390x.rpm sudo rpm -ivh libmcrypt-devel-2.5.8-18.fc24.s390x.rpm
sudo yum -y install httpd httpd-devel
cd $WORK_DIR/php-src ./buildconf --force ./configure --datadir=/usr/local/share/php --localstatedir=/var --mandir=/usr/local/share/man --prefix=/usr/local --sysconfdir=/usr/local/etc --enable-bcmath --enable-calendar --enable-ctype --with-curl --enable-dba=shared --enable-exif --enable-filter --enable-flatfile --enable-fpm --enable-ftp --enable-gd-native-ttf --enable-inifile --enable-intl --enable-mbstring --enable-mysqlnd --enable-opcache --enable-pcntl --enable-shmop --enable-simplexml --enable-sockets --enable-sysvsem --enable-sysvshm --enable-sysvmsg --enable-xmlreader --enable-xmlwriter --enable-zend-signals --enable-zip --disable-phpdbg --disable-phpdbg-webhelper --with-apxs2 --with-bz2 --with-config-file-path=/usr/local/etc --with-config-file-scan-dir=/usr/local/etc/conf.d --with-fpm-group=apache --with-fpm-user=apache --with-freetype-dir --with-gd --with-gdbm --with-gettext --with-gmp --with-iconv --with-jpeg-dir --with-kerberos --with-ldap --with-ldap-sasl --with-mcrypt --with-mysql-sock=/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock --with-mysqli=mysqlnd --with-openssl --with-pcre-regex --with-pdo-mysql=mysqlnd --with-pdo-odbc=unixODBC,/usr --with-pdo-pgsql --with-pdo-sqlite --with-pgsql --with-png-dir --with-readline --with-snmp --with-sqlite3 --with-unixODBC=/usr --with-xpm-dir=/usr --with-xsl --with-zlib --without-pcre-jit make clean make -j$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep processor | wc -l)
make test #(**NOTE:There are few test case failures which are also observed on Intel x86 platform. These failures can be ignored.)
sudo make install sudo install -m644 php.ini-production /usr/local/etc/php.ini sudo sed -i 's@php/includes"@&\ninclude_path = ".:/usr/local/lib/php"@' /usr/local/etc/php.ini
php -v
sudo chmod 776 /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default cd /usr/local/etc sudo sed -i '18i pid = run/php-fpm.pid' php-fpm.conf.default
sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf sudo mv /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf.default /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
sudo chmod 776 $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/php-fpm.service.in cd $WORK_DIR/php-src/sapi/fpm/
sudo sed -i '10d' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '10d' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '10d' php-fpm.service.in
sudo sed -i '10i Type=simple' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '11i PIDFile=/var/run/php-fpm.pid' php-fpm.service.in sudo sed -i '12i ExecStart=/usr/local/sbin/php-fpm --nodaemonize --fpm-config /usr/local/etc/php-fpm.conf' php-fpm.service.in
sudo chmod 776 /usr/local/etc/php.ini cd /usr/local/etc/
sudo sed -i '1784i zend_extension=opcache.so' php.ini
php -v
sudo chmod 766 /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf cd /etc/httpd/conf
sudo echo -e "<FilesMatch \.php$>" >> httpd.conf sudo echo -e "SetHandler application/x-httpd-php" >> httpd.conf sudo echo -e "</FilesMatch>" >> httpd.conf
sudo /usr/sbin/httpd -D BACKGROUND sleep 40s
cd /var/www/html sudo touch testphp.php
sudo chmod 766 testphp.php sudo echo -e "<?php" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "phpinfo();" >> testphp.php sudo echo -e "?>" >> testphp.php
cat -n testphp.php
sudo httpd -k restart curl http://127.0.0.1:80/testphp.php
